author: Google
description:
Meet the #PixelWatch 4 ⌚

✨ Design & Display
- All-new hardware in two sizes
- A bigger, brighter domed Actua 360 display with smaller bezels
- Fluid Material 3 Expressive UI with new customizable watch faces

❤️ Health & Fitness
- Improved sleep tracking and a next-gen skin temperature sensor
- New dual-frequency GPS for more accurate route tracking
- Stream cycling workout stats to your phone in real-time

🔒Performance & Safety
- Increased battery life (up to 40 hours) and a faster charging system
- Satellite communications for emergency assistance off the grid (a smartwatch first!)
- Loss of pulse detection for automatic emergency calls

🤖 AI & Software
- Raise-to-speak access to Gemini for help on the go
- New AI-generated smart replies with conversational context
title: Unboxing the new Pixel Watch 4 in both sizes
